title: Precious Mineral Found in Ham Dwelling
content:
A precious mineral has been spotted in a fridge of ham at Samanthaâ€™s Slaughterhouse. The mineral has a mysterious property, it glows brighter than Tekh in the night sky.

Many mysterious minerals have been found in damp areas before in Lui Kash. We have many instances to draw from. However, this is a peculiar discovery, in that the mineral is much larger than has ever known to be possible.

Minerals are a specialty dish in Lui Kash. The crystals are known to be crunchy and delicious, and the outer rock is as fluffy as a cloud.
